metadata.description: OpenCell developer tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: review-code
plugins.description: Review React and Node.js code for bugs, security, performance, and best practices

plugins.name: figma-mcp
plugins.description: Connect to Figma MCP server to extract design context, generate code from designs, and retrieve design tokens

plugins.name: atlassian-mcp
plugins.description: Connect to Atlassian MCP server to access Jira tickets, Confluence pages, and Compass services

plugins.name: bitbucket-mcp
plugins.description: Connect to Bitbucket MCP server to create pull requests, manage repositories, and review code

plugins.name: playwright-mcp
plugins.description: Connect to Playwright MCP server to automate browser interactions, take screenshots, and test web applications

plugins.name: cache-jira
plugins.description: Fetch and cache JIRA ticket data locally for use by other OpenCell commands

plugins.name: oc-commit
plugins.description: Commit changes using JIRA ticket ID and summary from cache with automatic code review

plugins.name: oc-pr
plugins.description: Push changes and create a pull request for a JIRA ticket with automatic squash and PR creation

plugins.name: oc-ui-creation
plugins.description: Create UI page from JIRA ticket ID using the frontend-engineer sub-agent

plugins.name: frontend-engineer
plugins.description: Expert React/TypeScript UI engineer sub-agent for building, refactoring, and architecting frontend components

plugins.name: frontend-reviewer
plugins.description: Frontend code reviewer sub-agent for validating React/TypeScript code against project standards
